98#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_VNODE_H_
99#define _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_VNODE_H_
100
101#ifdef _KERNEL
102
103struct vnode;
104struct vattr;
105
106typedef struct vnode vnode_t;
107typedef struct vattr vattr_t;
108typedef enum vtype vtype_t;
109
110#include <sys/namei.h>
111enum symfollow { NO_FOLLOW = NOFOLLOW };
112
113/*
114 * We'll use the two-parameter FreeBSD VOP_UNLOCK() in ZFS code.
115 */
116
117#define VOP_UNLOCK __hide_VOP_UNLOCK
118#include_next <sys/vnode.h>
119/* verify that the real definition is what we expect */
120int __hide_VOP_UNLOCK(struct vnode *);
121#undef VOP_UNLOCK
122
123int VOP_UNLOCK(struct vnode *, int);
124
125#include <sys/cred.h>
126#include <sys/fcntl.h>
127#include <sys/proc.h>
128#include <sys/filedesc.h>
129#include <sys/buf.h>
130
131#include <sys/vfs_syscalls.h>
132
133typedef int (**vnodeops_t)(void *);
134
135#define vop_fid vop_vptofh
136#define vop_fid_args vop_vptofh_args
137#define a_fid a_fhp
138
139#define v_count v_usecount
140#define v_object v_uobj
141
142struct vop_vptofh_args {
143 struct vnode *a_vp;
144 struct fid *a_fid;
145};
146
147#define IS_XATTRDIR(vp) (0)
148
149#define v_lock v_interlock
150
151#define SAVENAME 0
152
153int vn_is_readonly(vnode_t *);
154
155#define vn_vfswlock(vp) (0)
156#define vn_vfsunlock(vp) do { } while (0)
157#define vn_ismntpt(vp) ((vp)->v_type == VDIR && (vp)->v_mountedhere != NULL)
158#define vn_mountedvfs(vp) ((vp)->v_mountedhere)
159#define vn_has_cached_data(vp) ((vp)->v_uobj.uo_npages != 0)
160#define vn_exists(vp) do { } while (0)
161#define vn_invalid(vp) do { } while (0)
162#define vn_free(vp) do { } while (0)
163#define vn_renamepath(tdvp, svp, tnm, lentnm) do { } while (0)
164#define vn_matchops(vp, vops) ((vp)->v_op == &(vops))
165
166#define VN_HOLD(v) vref(v)
167#define VN_RELE(v) \
168do { \
169 if ((v)->v_usecount == 0) { \
170 printf("VN_RELE(%s,%d): %p unused\n", __FILE__, __LINE__, v); \
171 vprint("VN_RELE", (v)); \
172 panic("VN_RELE"); \
173 } else { \
174 vrele(v); \
175 } \
176} while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
177#define VN_URELE(v) vput(v)
178#undef VN_RELE_ASYNC
179#define VN_RELE_ASYNC(vp, taskq) vrele_async((vp))
180#define VN_RELE_CLEANER(vp, taskq) /* nothing */
181
182#define vnevent_create(vp, ct) do { } while (0)
183#define vnevent_link(vp, ct) do { } while (0)
184#define vnevent_remove(vp, dvp, name, ct) do { } while (0)
185#define vnevent_rmdir(vp, dvp, name, ct) do { } while (0)
186#define vnevent_rename_src(vp, dvp, name, ct) do { } while (0)
187#define vnevent_rename_dest(vp, dvp, name, ct) do { } while (0)
188#define vnevent_rename_dest_dir(vp, ct) do { } while (0)
189
190#define specvp(vp, rdev, type, cr) (VN_HOLD(vp), (vp))
191#define MANDMODE(mode) (0)
192#define MANDLOCK(vp, mode) (0)
193#define chklock(vp, op, offset, size, mode, ct) (0)
194#define cleanlocks(vp, pid, foo) do { } while (0)
195#define cleanshares(vp, pid) do { } while (0)
196
197/*
198 * We will use va_spare is place of Solaris' va_mask.
199 * This field is initialized in zfs_setattr().
200 */
201#define va_mask va_spare
202/* TODO: va_fileid is shorter than va_nodeid !!! */
203#define va_nodeid va_fileid
204/* TODO: This field needs conversion! */
205#define va_nblocks va_bytes
206#define va_blksize va_blocksize
207#define va_seq va_gen
208
209#define EXCL 0
210
211#define ACCESSED (AT_ATIME)
212#define STATE_CHANGED (AT_CTIME)
213#define CONTENT_MODIFIED (AT_MTIME | AT_CTIME)
214
215static inline void
216vattr_init_mask(vattr_t *vap)
217{
218
219 vap->va_mask = 0;
220
221 if (vap->va_type != VNON)
222 vap->va_mask |= AT_TYPE;
223 if (vap->va_uid != (uid_t)VNOVAL)
224 vap->va_mask |= AT_UID;
225 if (vap->va_gid != (gid_t)VNOVAL)
226 vap->va_mask |= AT_GID;
227 if (vap->va_size != (u_quad_t)VNOVAL)
228 vap->va_mask |= AT_SIZE;
229 if (vap->va_atime.tv_sec != VNOVAL)
230 vap->va_mask |= AT_ATIME;
231 if (vap->va_mtime.tv_sec != VNOVAL)
232 vap->va_mask |= AT_MTIME;
233 if (vap->va_mode != (mode_t)VNOVAL)
234 vap->va_mask |= AT_MODE;
235}
236
237#define FCREAT O_CREAT
238#define FTRUNC O_TRUNC
239#define FSYNC FFSYNC
240#define FOFFMAX 0x00
241
242static inline int
243zfs_vn_open(const char *pnamep, enum uio_seg seg, int filemode, int createmode,
244 vnode_t **vpp, enum create crwhy, mode_t umask)
245{
246 struct pathbuf *pb;
247 struct nameidata nd;
248 int error;
249
250 ASSERT(seg == UIO_SYSSPACE);
251 ASSERT((filemode & (FWRITE | FCREAT | FTRUNC | FOFFMAX)) != 0);
252 ASSERT(crwhy == CRCREAT);
253 ASSERT(umask == 0);
254
255 pb = pathbuf_create(pnamep);
256 NDINIT(&nd, LOOKUP, NOFOLLOW, pb);
257 error = vn_open(&nd, filemode, createmode);
258 if (error == 0) {
259 VOP_UNLOCK(nd.ni_vp, 0);
260 *vpp = nd.ni_vp;
261 }
262 pathbuf_destroy(pb);
263 return (error);
264}
265#define vn_open(pnamep, seg, filemode, createmode, vpp, crwhy, umask) \
266 zfs_vn_open((pnamep), (seg), (filemode), (createmode), (vpp), (crwhy), (umask))
267
268#define vn_openat(pnamep, seg, filemode, createmode, vpp, crwhy, umask, rootvn, unk) \
269 zfs_vn_open((pnamep), (seg), (filemode), (createmode), (vpp), (crwhy), (umask))
270
271#define RLIM64_INFINITY 0
272static inline int
273zfs_vn_rdwr(enum uio_rw rw, vnode_t *vp, caddr_t base, ssize_t len,
274 offset_t offset, enum uio_seg seg, int ioflag, uint64_t ulimit, cred_t *cr,
275 ssize_t *residp)
276{
277 int error;
278 size_t resid;
279
280 ASSERT(rw == UIO_READ || rw == UIO_WRITE);
281 ASSERT(ioflag == 0);
282 ASSERT(ulimit == RLIM64_INFINITY);
283
284 ioflag = IO_UNIT;
285
286 error = vn_rdwr(rw, vp, base, len, offset, seg, ioflag, cr,
287 &resid, curlwp);
288 if (residp != NULL)
289 *residp = (ssize_t)resid;
290 return (error);
291}
292#define vn_rdwr(rw, vp, base, len, offset, seg, ioflag, ulimit, cr, residp) \
293 zfs_vn_rdwr((rw), (vp), (base), (len), (offset), (seg), (ioflag), (ulimit), (cr), (residp))
294
295static inline int
296zfs_vop_fsync(vnode_t *vp, int flag, cred_t *cr)
297{
298 int error;
299
300 ASSERT(flag == FSYNC);
301
302 vn_lock(vp, LK_EXCLUSIVE | LK_RETRY);
303 error = VOP_FSYNC(vp, cr, FSYNC_WAIT, 0, 0);
304 VOP_UNLOCK(vp, 0);
305 return (error);
306}
307#define VOP_FSYNC(vp, flag, cr, unk) zfs_vop_fsync((vp), (flag), (cr))
308
309static inline int
310zfs_vop_close(vnode_t *vp, int flag, int count, offset_t offset, cred_t *cr)
311{
312
313 ASSERT(flag == (FWRITE | FCREAT | FTRUNC | FOFFMAX));
314 ASSERT(count == 1);
315 ASSERT(offset == 0);
316
317 return (vn_close(vp, flag, cr));
318}
319#define VOP_CLOSE(vp, oflags, count, offset, cr, unk) \
320 zfs_vop_close((vp), (oflags), (count), (offset), (cr))
321
322static inline int
323zfs_vop_getattr(vnode_t *vp, vattr_t *ap, int flag, cred_t *cr)
324{
325 int error;
326
327 vn_lock(vp, LK_EXCLUSIVE | LK_RETRY);
328 error = VOP_GETATTR(vp, ap, cr);
329 VOP_UNLOCK(vp, 0);
330 return (error);
331}
332#define VOP_GETATTR(vp, ap, flag, cr, unk) zfs_vop_getattr((vp), (ap), (flag), (cr))
333
334static inline int
335zfs_vop_seek(vnode_t *vp, off_t off, off_t *offp)
336{
337 int error;
338
339 vn_lock(vp, LK_EXCLUSIVE | LK_RETRY);
340 error = VOP_SEEK(vp, off, *offp, CRED());
341 VOP_UNLOCK(vp, 0);
342 return (error);
343}
344#define VOP_SEEK(vp, off, offp, unk) zfs_vop_seek(vp, off, offp)
345
346#define B_INVAL BC_INVAL
347
348static inline int
349zfs_vop_putpage(vnode_t *vp, off_t off, size_t len, int flag)
350{
351 int nbflag;
352
353 nbflag = 0;
354 if (len == 0) {
355 nbflag |= PGO_ALLPAGES;
356 }
357 if ((flag & B_ASYNC) == 0) {
358 nbflag |= PGO_SYNCIO;
359 }
360 if ((flag & B_INVAL) != 0) {
361 nbflag |= PGO_FREE;
362 } else {
363 nbflag |= PGO_CLEANIT;
364 }
365
366 mutex_enter(vp->v_interlock);
367 return VOP_PUTPAGES(vp, off, len, nbflag);
368}
369#define VOP_PUTPAGE(vp, off, len, flag, cr, ct) zfs_vop_putpage((vp), (off), (len), (flag))
370
371static inline int
372vn_rename(char *from, char *to, enum uio_seg seg)
373{
374
375 ASSERT(seg == UIO_SYSSPACE);
376
377 return (do_sys_rename(from, to, seg, 0));
378}
379
380static inline int
381vn_remove(char *fnamep, enum uio_seg seg, enum rm dirflag)
382{
383
384 ASSERT(seg == UIO_SYSSPACE);
385 ASSERT(dirflag == RMFILE);
386
387 return (do_sys_unlink(fnamep, seg));
388}
389
390/*
391 * VOP_ACCESS flags
392 */
393#define V_APPEND 0x2 /* want to do append only check */
394
395#define VV_NOSYNC 0
396
397#define VI_LOCK(vp) mutex_enter((vp)->v_interlock)
398#define VI_UNLOCK(vp) mutex_exit((vp)->v_interlock)
399
400#define VATTR_NULL(x) vattr_null(x)
401
402#define getnewvnode_reserve(x)
403#define getnewvnode_drop_reserve()
404#define cache_purge_negative(vp) cache_purge(vp)
405
406#endif /* _KERNEL */
407
408#endif /* _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_VNODE_H_ */
